snippet: Eddie Jordan, 57, fired as coach of the Philadelphia 76ers in 2010, is coaching freshmen at his alma mater, Archbishop Carroll High School in Washington.
abstract: Former NBA coach Eddie Jordan is coaching freshmen boys at his high school alma mater Archbishop Carroll in Washington while he bides his time for another shot in the NBA.
lead_paragraph: Eddie Jordan, 57, fired as coach of the Philadelphia 76ers in 2010, is coaching freshmen at his alma mater, Archbishop Carroll High School in Washington.

headline.seo: Eddie Jordan Goes From N.B.A. to High School
headline.main: Coach Goes From Pros to His Old High School
headline.print_headline: Ex-N.B.A. Coach Bides His Time in a Job Where Patience Really Pays
